name: Love, Lust, and Learning: A Student's Journey
name_original: Love, Lust, and Learning: A Student's Journey
description: Join a man on his journey as the only male student in a women's studies program at a university in 'Love, Lust, and Learning: A Student's Journey'. You'll have the opportunity to get to know and connect with your female professors and classmates, and you'll have to make decisions about your relationships and your studies. Can you find love and balance in a sea of women? Play this Twine game and see what happens.
